code: import React from'react';import{deleteRecipe}from'../../DataBase/Database';import'./ReciepeCard.scss';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ReciepeCard({id,title,image,user}){const navigate=useNavigate();const modifyReciepe=async()=>{const d={idReciepe:id,user:user,isNew:false};const data=encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(d));navigate('/reciepe/'+data);};const deleteReciepe=async()=>{await deleteRecipe(id);window.location.reload();};return _jsxs("div",{className:"card_container",children:[_jsx("div",{className:"card_title_container",children:_jsx("p",{className:"card_title",children:title})}),_jsx("div",{className:"card_image_container",children:_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"",className:"card_image"})}),_jsxs("div",{className:"card_button_container",children:[_jsx("button",{className:"card_button",onClick:deleteReciepe,children:"delete"}),_jsx("button",{className:"card_button",onClick:modifyReciepe,children:"edit"})]})]});}export default ReciepeCard;
